stack:stack.stack:script:
import pathlib import sys import subprocess import xml.etree.ElementTree import stack.util
# Bail if the roll XML is missing. rolls_xml = "/tmp/rolls.xml" if not pathlib.Path(rolls_xml).exists(): sys.exit(1)
root_element = xml.etree.ElementTree.parse(rolls_xml).getroot()
cmd = "/opt/stack/bin/stack" # Add pallet can now recursively add everything under a given URL, # so only iterate over unique URLs. unique_urls = stack.util.unique_everseen( element.attrib["url"] for element in root_element.iter() if element.attrib.get("url") ) subprocess.run([cmd, "add", "pallet", *unique_urls], check = True)
# Create the frontend box if it doesn't exist. # If it already exists, a command error is raised, so don't check the returncode. subprocess.run([cmd, "add", "box", "frontend"])
# Enable all pallets for the default and frontend boxes subprocess.run([cmd, "enable", "pallet", r"%"], check = True) subprocess.run([cmd, "enable", "pallet", r"%", "box=frontend"], check = True)
